metadata.title: CVE-2020-7760 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: This affects the package codemirror before 5.58.2; the packageorg.apache.marmotta.webjars:codemirror before 5.58.2. The vulnerableregular expression is located inhttps://github.com/codemirror/CodeMirror/blob/cdb228ac736369c685865b122b736cd0d397836c/mode/javascript/javascript.jsL129.The ReDOS vulnerability of the regex is mainly due to the sub-pattern(s|/*.*?*/)*

criterions.comment: codemirror-js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
